name: Last Train Home (Caladrius)
description:
Work hard, play hard.

If there’s one thing that could be said for Hubert it’s definitely that he’s hard. But oh no! He’s got himself on the circle line and he’s so drunk he keeps missing his stop!

Try your best to guide a very inebriated Hubert through the train and onto the platform!

From the team that brought you Bubbles Saves Grandma, back again with another impossible to control nightmare. “Last Train Home“ is a train escape survival horror? A nail-biting action-adventure experience? Chess?!

  • WASD to move (Tank Controls)
  • SPACEBAR to lunge
  • R to reset
  • ESC to quit to menu
